short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to improve the user experience in FUT...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Web App Tools you can update the unsold players price and re-sell them automatically.
You can analyze the market by identifying the lowest price for each individual item.
And, with the Sniper Tool function, you can cyclically searche for the desired object and try to buy it for a price equal to or lower than the ceiling price.

To purchase the license follow the link:
https://gum.co/BvNov

Terms and Conditions
The creator disclaims any liability deriving from improper use of this extension and/or from any violations of third party t.o.s. .
By using it, you assume all responsibilities resulting from the use itself.
This extension is sold with “sold as seen” agreement form.

Privacy Policy
The creator and this software does not collect or use user data.

!!! Attention !!! 
Web App Tools supports English language only. You can select it from web page settings.
